DOC.criteria: Age ≥ 21 ≤ 50 year BMI 25.035.0 kg/m2 Fasting plasma TG concentration ≥100 mg/dl Men Medical , surgical , biological menopause Previous bariatric surgery gastrointestinal surgery Structured exercise > 2 days/week ≥ 35 min intense exercise ( e.g. , jogging , activity cause heavy breathe sweat ) ≥ 150 min per week moderate intensity exercise ( e.g. , brisk walking ) Unstable weight ( > 5 % change last 2 month enter study ) Significant organ system dysfunction ( e.g. , diabetes require medication , severe pulmonary , disorder gastrointestinal tract , kidney cardiovascular disease ) Current cancer cancer remission < 5 year Conditions render subject unable complete testing procedure ( e.g. , severe ambulatory impairment , limb amputation , metal implant interfere image procedure ; coagulation disorder ) Use medication judge investigator affect study outcome measure increase risk study procedure ( e.g. , anticoagulant ) temporarily discontinue study Smoke cigarettes use illegal drug Consumption > 14 unit alcohol ( e.g. , glass wine bottle beer ) per week Pregnant lactating Persons able grant voluntary inform consent Persons unable unwilling follow study protocol , reason , research team considers appropriate candidate study , include noncompliance screen appointment study visit
